data.actual_result: They are put in some random order that I cannot find the servers I have placed at the top of my list.
data.expected_result: The emojis should remain in the order of the servers on the left side of the app.
data.short_description: With Nitro, on desktop, the external emoji list is in the order you have put the servers in to the left, however on Android the servers are in a completely random order, not alphabetical, not in the order of my list, not in the order of which servers I have joined first, etc.
data.steps_to_repro: - With Nitro, observe the order of the external emoji servers compared to the list of servers you have. - If possible, compare the list to on desktop, how the order is different from on Android
